name: Cuesoft GmbH
tagline: We bring your software to new customers
description: Cuesoft offers individual software solutions of any kind. Our speciality is the globalization of existing software in a convenient way for our customers. We provide a full range of services for any software globalization project, from internationalization and localization to Porting to Local Marketing. We also offer implementation of our customer's ideas in global and cross-platform software.
